abstract: The rough-and-ready video quality of journalism during the coronavirus crisis is changing the way we engage with the media.

lead_paragraph: National crises are often identified by the media innovations they engender. The 2016 presidential contest will forever be remembered as the election when Twitter and other social media platforms became an irresistible force in national politics.
